appDescription: Real-time disaster alerts and community resources to keep you safe during emergencies.
discoverActivities: Discover things to do in your area, with real-time safety ratings.
safetyDisclaimerDescription: Activities are rated based on current conditions. Always check for active alerts in your area before participating in any activity. DisasterAlert is not responsible for any injuries or damages resulting from participation in listed activities.
localChatDescription: Connect with your community and share real-time updates.
noMessagesinZone: No messages yet in this location
chatGuidelinesText: Be respectful and helpful to community members.
realTimeAlerts: Real-time disaster alerts and community resources to keep you and your loved ones safe during emergencies.
noActiveAlerts: No active alerts in your area.
activeAlertsDescription: View all active emergency alerts and warnings for your area.
hazardMapDescription: Explore the latest hazard maps and stay informed about potential risks in your area.
resourcesDescription: Locate shelters, medical help, and supplies near you.
water1: Water (1 gallon per person per day)
emergencyPkit2: Essential supplies to have ready before disaster strikes.
lr_desc: Locate shelters, medical help, and supplies near you.
be_first: Be the first to send a message!
chatGuidelinesText2: Share accurate information about emergency conditions.
chatGuidelinesText3: Coordinate resources and assistance with your neighbors.
chatGuidelinesText4: Report dangerous conditions to emergency services.
